name: spark-space
description: AI-Driven Deployment Tool - Full Stack Application

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:shared && npm run typecheck:backend && npm run typecheck:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules shared/node_modules frontend/dist backend/dist shared/dist
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build:shared

author: hacknotch
